CustomField.description: When set, when an attendee receives an invite from AttendeeLink, they will not see the Not You button. A common use case for this is with invite-only events and with attendees forwarding invite emails to block other people from registering.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When set, when an attendee receives an invite from AttendeeLink, they will not see the Not You button. A common use case for this is with invite-only events and with attendees forwarding invite emails to block other people from registering.
CustomField.label: Disable Not You
